messages.text: I actually tried to spend half a hour to fix Cassette a while ago, didn’t make it...so I just write my own CodeInfo...

elements.text: I actually tried to spend half a hour to fix Cassette a while ago, didn’t make it...so I just write my own CodeInfo...

messages.text:
I'm trying to get a feel for cassette but the code below throws an error, could anyone tell me what I'm doing wrong?
Thanks
```using Cassette

Cassette.@context Ctx
ctx = Cassette.enabletagging(Ctx(), 1)

Cassette.metadatatype(::Type{<:Ctx}, ::Int) = Bool

a = 2
Cassette.tag(a, ctx, true) #ERROR: MethodError: Cannot `convert` an object of type Bool to an object of type Cassette.NoMetaData```

elements.text:
I'm trying to get a feel for cassette but the code below throws an error, could anyone tell me what I'm doing wrong?
Thanks

using Cassette

Cassette.@context Ctx
ctx = Cassette.enabletagging(Ctx(), 1)

Cassette.metadatatype(::Type{<:Ctx}, ::Int) = Bool

a = 2
Cassette.tag(a, ctx, true) #ERROR: MethodError: Cannot `convert` an object of type Bool to an object of type Cassette.NoMetaData

messages.text: <@UM30MT6RF> how sure that Cassette is not messing this up?

elements.text: how sure that Cassette is not messing this up?

messages.text: E.g. Can we fix this by pushing the right line information during the Cassette pass?

elements.text: E.g. Can we fix this by pushing the right line information during the Cassette pass?
